snippet: Gov. Rick Perry named the replacement for the slain Kaufman County district attorney, Mike McClelland, on Wednesday — a local judge who has become the first black woman to be a top prosecutor in Texas.
abstract: Texas Gov Rick Perry names Erleigh Norville Wiley as replacement for the slain Kaufman County district attorney Mike McLelland; she is local judge who is first black woman to be a top prosecutor in state.
lead_paragraph: Gov. Rick Perry named the replacement for the slain Kaufman County district attorney, Mike McClelland, on Wednesday — a local judge who has become the first black woman to be a top prosecutor in Texas.

headline.main: Texas: Judge to Replace Slain Prosecutor
headline.print_headline: Texas: Judge To Replace Slain Prosecutor
